Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
MRBC SPOTLIGHT: REBELLION ON CARVER V!


[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreOutreach],Outreach]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreFedCom],Federated Commonwealth]]: After both pro-[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKatherineSteiner],Katrina]] and pro-[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreVictorSD],Victor]] forces called in reinforcements, fighting is at an all time high on [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCarverV],Carver V]]. Refugees gather in makeshift camps as tanks and BattleMechs roam the countryside, attacking and counterattacking in an attempt to wrest control of the planet.


New reports, however, confirm that a revolt is underway on the planet. Civilians, some say in the thousands, have banded together to stop the destruction of their planet.  Rallying under an ex-civil engineer, and styling themselves the Partisans, they seek to create a world free of [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGreatHouses],Great House]] control. More importantly, sources from the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreVictorSD],Victor]] camp have indicated they would support an independent world the Partisans now call Liberty.  Meanwhile, all sides are calling for reinforcements.

Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreXinSheng],XIN SHENG]] CAMPAIGN REACHES SAIPH TRIUMVIRATE


Stymied by their initial repulse during [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreOpGuerrero],Operation GUERRERO]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHouseLiao],House Liao]] is again attempting to conquer the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreChaosMarch],Chaos March]] micro-state.  Claiming to be assisting local independence-minded guerilla movements, the [[DM.Factions[faction_Liao],Capellan Confederation]] has sent a mixture of House and mercenary units into the Triumvirate.  Using these local guerillas to tie down Triumvirate units on Tall Trees, the Confederation's [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHarlocRaiders],Harloc Raiders]] are engaging the Balantine Guard and [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreStalwartSupport],Stalwart Support]] on New Canton, while [[DM.Factions[faction_1stMcCarronsArmoredCavalry],McCarron's Armored Cavalry]] are attacking the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCannedHeat],Canned Heat]] on Saiph.  Count Balantine has sent agents to nearby Outreach to secure more mercenary support, while Chancellor [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSunTzuLiao],Sun-Zhu Liao]] is calling on "all true patriots" to assist the Confederation's cause.


Attack and defend contracts are available via the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMRBC],MRBC]] database.
